    Predictor Variables

    Maddee Rubenson & Skyler Lewis

    2024-11-07

    predictor_variables.Rmd

    Data Sources

    Datasets publicly available by ComID reach:

    • USGS NHDPlusV2 EPA Distribution including Value Added Attribute tables
    • NHDPlusV2 WSC Supplements1
    • US EPA StreamCat Dataset
    • Natural Flows Database2

    Transformation and calculation required to map onto ComID reach:

    • HQT
    • UC Davis eFlows
    • MERIT Hydro Width Dataset
    • MODIS
    • CDFW ACE & California Freshwater Species Database V2

    1. Wieczorek, M.E., Jackson, S.E., and Schwarz, G.E., 2018, Select Attributes for NHDPlus Version 2.1 Reach Catchments and Modified Network Routed Upstream Watersheds for the Conterminous United States (ver. 4.0, August 2023): U.S. Geological Survey data release, https://doi.org/10.5066/F7765D7V.↩︎

    2. California Environmental Flows Working Group (CEFWG). California Natural Flows Database: Functional flow metrics v1.2.1, May 2021. https://rivers.codefornature.org/↩︎
